attributes.action: Relax the financial regualtions for Clubs and friendly societies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whist the need to curb money laundering is appreciated,the requirements of the banks for changes of signaturies of funds of clubs and friendly societies result in many weeks of delay in gaining access to funds, often quite small, when a Treasurer dies, or leaves, and the reqirement to produce a death certificate is an unwelcome imposition on the deceased relatives.
